attributes.action: Make use of human-implantable radio frequency ID (RFID) illegal in banking law
attributes.additional_details:
The Book of Revelation, Chapter 13, Verse 16-18, The Authorised King James Bible

    And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads: And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name. Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number is Six hundred threescore and six
attributes.background: Contactless payment uses radio frequency identification (RFID) microchips. These are found in smart phones and payment cards. People around the world are being implanted under-the-skin with them. We believe we should honour our national religion and Her Majesty the Queen heeding to Revelation 13

rejection.details: We can't find any evidence that banks around the world are planning to use, or are already using, this technology in humans.
